compatibility.$comment: Based on the entity appropriate schema is selected and used by the system. Examples of different catalog item are Designs, Models, relationships. For designs compatibility only requires model, for Model compatability requires Registrant, version and name

oneOf.title: Model
oneOf.$comment: Content published into the catalog must reference at least one model, and by implication, contain at least one component.
oneOf.description: One or more models associated with this catalog item. For designs, a list of one or more models implicated by components within the design. For models, this is self-referential.

pattern_caveats.title: Caveats and Considerations
pattern_caveats.description: Specific stipulations to consider and known behaviors to be aware of when using this design.

pattern_info.title: Description
pattern_info.description: Purpose of the design along with its intended and unintended uses.

type.title: Type
type.description: Categorization of the type of design or operational flow depicted in this design.

snapshotURL.description: Contains reference to the dark and light mode snapshots of the design.
